data.text: Kupula kwangu kuvike kuulongozi wako kamba yosi da ubani usomigwa,
Go Mndewa Imulungu, ika mkalizi kumulomo wangu,
Sambi uutogolele moyo wangu utende gehile,
Vinoga munhu mwene haki yanizume kwa kunikoboza,
Watawala zao otupigwa hasi kulawa kumibwe,
Lakini niye nokutamanila gweye Mndewa Imulungu, Imulungu wangu,
Wanhu wehile wanamate mmizavu yao wenyego,
